img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*, set in a dimly lit cave environment. The player-controlled character, resembling the Monkey King, is engaged in battle with a skeletal enemy wielding a shield. The surroundings feature rocky terrain, scattered bones, and a faintly illuminated tunnel in the background, hinting at the path forward. The interface displays health and ability icons, suggesting active gameplay. This scene aligns with the guide's mention of navigating the "Cliff of Oblivion" and encountering hidden skeletal enemies.
